metadata.title: SanDisk 16GB Cruzer Blade USB Flash Drive 3-Pack, Blue/Pink/Green
features: Share your photos, videos, songs and other files between computers with ease
Protect your private files with included SanDisk Secure Access software
So simple to use, you can be up and running in seconds
It couldnâ€™t be easier to use: simply drag and drop files
Compact, light design makes it easy to carry round
Store more with higher capacities. Operating temperature: 0 degree Celsius to 45 degree Celsius
description: The Cruzer Blade USB Flash Drive may look small, but it has all the space you need to store and share tunes, pictures and home videos or your presentations and spreadsheets, whenever you want. Despite storing a large capacity in a compact and contoured design, the Cruzer Blade USB Flash Drive is barely half the size of most USB flash drives.
